import { useState } from "react" import { addInputField } from "./worksheetInputs" export const TestModule2 = ({ user }) => { const [chosenInputs, setChosenInputs] = useState([]) const handleAddInputButton = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const copy = [...chosenInputs] copy.push(addInputField()) setChosenInputs(copy) } const handleAddDropdownButton = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const copy = [...chosenInputs] copy.push(addInputField()) setChosenInputs(copy) } // teacher view should be able to view ALL students she creater // parent view should be able to view only the student she syncs with the student code return ( <>
{/* */}
{chosenInputs.map((chosenInput) => { return chosenInput })}
) }
